referral_program_subtitle: Convide amigos e ganhe 5% dos ganhos deles!
referral_program_description: Ganhe 5% dos ganhos por cada amigo que se cadastrar com seu código e completar as tarefas.
qr_code_description: Seu amigo pode escanear este código para se cadastrar.
start_sharing_to_earn: Comece a compartilhar seu código para ganhar recompensas!
referral_code_placeholder: Digite o código do seu amigo
review_and_manage_contractor_tasks: Revise e gerencie todas as tarefas criadas pelos contratantes.

job_deletion_consequence: A exclusão de uma tarefa ativa pode exigir reembolso manual dos fundos em escrow.
identity_verification_description: To activate your account and access all features, please submit your documents.
missing_documents_description: Please submit the front, back of the document, and the selfie.
error_uploading_documents_description: Could not upload one or more documents. Please try again.
verification_submitted_description: Your documents have been submitted and are under review.
verification_pending_description: Your documents are being reviewed. You will be notified shortly.
verification_approved_description: Your identity has been successfully verified. You have full access to the platform.
verification_rejected_description: Your verification was rejected. Please review the requirements and resubmit the documents.
verification_required_apply_description: Your account must be verified before you can apply for tasks. Please complete identity verification.
verification_required_withdrawal_descrip: Your account must be verified before you can make withdrawals. Please complete identity verification.
hero_description: We connect qualified freelancers with companies that need to validate their apps and websites. Work when you want, from anywhere.
how_it_works_description: The process is easy and transparent, ensuring you get paid for your work.
register_description: Create your account in minutes and complete identity verification.
choose_tasks_description: Select app testing tasks (iOS, Android, Web) that fit your skills.
receive_payment_description: After contractor approval, payment is instantly credited to your wallet.
earn_money_free_time: Earn Money in Your Free Time
earn_money_free_time_description: Turn your free time into extra income by testing apps and providing valuable feedback.
payment_range: Payments from 5 KZ to 50 KZ per task
flexible_hours: Flexible hours, work when you want
work_anywhere: Work from anywhere in the world
flexible_description: Choose your own hours and tasks. You are in control.
secure_description: Payment guarantee and data protection in all transactions.
fast_description: Agile approval and payment process so you get paid quickly.
focused_description: Specific app testing tasks to maximize your efficiency.
professional_validation_apps_description: Get high-quality feedback from a community of real testers to ensure your product's excellence.
multi_platform_tasks: Testing on multiple platforms (iOS, Android, Web)
multiplatform_description: Test your app on all relevant devices and operating systems.
maria_silva_quote: Freelincer changed my life. I can earn extra money testing apps in my free time. Payment is fast and support is excellent!
joao_oliveira_quote: The quality of the bug reports we receive is unmatched. Freelincer is essential for our QA cycle.
ana_santos_quote: The testers' feedback helped us identify critical flaws before launch. I recommend the platform to any developer.
ready_to_start_description: Join our community of freelancers or post your first task in minutes.
tell_about_yourself: Tell us a little about yourself...
bounty_value_description: Set the amount each freelancer will receive for successful task completion.
bounty_value_min_max: The value must be between 5 KZ and 50 KZ.
detailed_instructions_description: List the exact steps the freelancer must follow to complete the task.
instruction_placeholder: Ex: Step 1: Create a test account with the email...
proof_requirements_description: Specify the proofs the freelancer must submit to confirm completion.
proof_description_placeholder: Describe what should be visible in the proof.
basic_information_description: Title, description, and platform of the task.
additional_details_description: Set the estimated time, location, and applicant limit.
optional_comment_placeholder: Add a comment about this proof...
fill_all_required_fields: Please fill in all required fields.
proof_placeholder_text: Enter the response or information here...
report_contractor_description: Submit a formal report against the contractor of this task.
report_submitted_description: Your report has been sent for administration review.
error_submitting_report_description: Could not submit the report. Please try again.
unauthenticated_report: You need to be logged in to submit a report.
confirm_report_approval: Confirm report approval. This may lead to actions against the reported user.
resolution_action_placeholder: Describe the action taken (e.g., 7-day suspension, formal warning).
